title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: Python & JS library that ships an Ollama integration for building LLM apps with retrieval, chains, agents, memory and more.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama REST API—chat, generate, pull, create, list, delete models.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, create, list models; sync & async APIs.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to any local Ollama instance; supports multiple models, chats, file uploads.

title: jmorganca/ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK repo (same package as PyPI) with examples for chat, generate, embeddings, multimodal.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript SDK repo; identical to npm package, includes browser & Node usage examples.

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rust/ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-dotnet/ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET client library for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings via HttpClient.

title: ollama-haystack by deepset
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-laravel/ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around Ollama API for PHP developers; supports chat, generate, pull.

title: ollama-helm/ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU node support.

title: ollama-docker/ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image sources and compose examples for running Ollama containerised with CUDA/ROCm.

title: ollama-copilot/ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds local AI code completion powered by any Ollama model (Codellama, etc.).

title: ollama-cli/ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI for Ollama with interactive model picker, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-streamlit/ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama; supports multi-model conversations, file uploads, markdown.

title: ollama-obsidian/ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your notes using Ollama models and templates.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Community thread sharing favorite Ollama tools, wrappers, and integrations beyond official clients.

title: ollama-hackernews launch
summary: Hacker News discussion around Ollama v0.1.30 release highlighting GPU performance and new model gallery.
